name: brainly_tools
description: A toolbox for Brainly markets. It helps moderators for doing some quick actions and more..

scripts.dist: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET=chrome gulp dist

scripts_Comments.*: This commands will be commented until it has cross-browser support
scripts_Comments.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run chrome-build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run opera-build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run firefox-build
scripts_Comments.chrome-dist: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET=chrome gulp dist
scripts_Comments.opera-dist: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET=opera gulp dist
scripts_Comments.firefox-dist: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET=firefox gulp dist
scripts_Comments.dist: npm run chrome-dist && npm run opera-dist && npm run firefox-dist

author: Sahin D. <seahindeniz@gmail.com> (https://github.com/seahindeniz)
